claims.object: systematic process of identifying, describing, and relating the functions a system must perform in order to be successful
translating system-level requirements into detailed functional architecture

surface_layer.definition: Functional analysis is the systematic process of identifying, describing, and relating the functions a system must perform in order to to be successful.

deep_layer.mechanism: Functional Analysis allows identification of functional issues to prompt the re-examination of higher-level requirements

examples: Functional Analysis at subsystem level to define the avionic subsystem of an aircraft
Functional Analysis at system level to define a satellite in Low Earth Orbit (LEO)
Functional Analysis to a Cubesat project
